name: Arcos da Lapa
address: Cardinal Câmara Square, in the Central Zone of Rio de Janeiro
description: The Lapa Arches, also known as the Carioca Aqueduct, are one of the most famous postcards of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.

name: Rio de Janeiro Botanical Garden
address: Rua Jardim Botânico, 1008, Jardim Botânico, Rio de Janeiro
description: The Rio de Janeiro Botanical Garden is one of the most beautiful and important parks in Brazil, located in the southern part of the city. Founded in 1808 by D. João VI, the space is home to a rich diversity of national and international flora, including rare and endangered species.

name: Pedra Bonita
address: Parque Nacional da Tijuca, na Estrada das Canoas, em São Conrado, Rio de Janeiro
description: Pedra Bonita is a famous tourist spot in Tijuca National Park, in Rio de Janeiro. Located at an altitude of about 693 meters, it offers an accessible trail and spectacular panoramic views of landmarks such as Morro Dois Irmãos, Pedra da Gávea and the city of Rio. It is also very popular with hang gliders and paragliders, due to its launch ramp. A perfect destination for adventure and nature lovers!
